name: FRANK N. SHAFFER FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP and Kevin and Kendra Shaffer, Petitioners v. ZONING HEARING BOARD OF CHANCEFORD TOWNSHIP, Respondent Chanceford Township, Intervenor

parties: FRANK N. SHAFFER FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP and Kevin and Kendra Shaffer, Petitioners v. ZONING HEARING BOARD OF CHANCEFORD TOWNSHIP, Respondent Chanceford Township, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following-question:
Do the creation of a planned community under the Uniform Planned Communities Act, and the conveyance of a unit within the planned community, constitute land development or subdivision subject to local ordinances enacted pursuant to the Municipalities Planning Code?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
